subject: Enquiry on order #SSN4404
description_text:
Ti whom this may concern,

I'm emailing you this evening to enquire what's happening with my order.
I have been expecting this for a while a f it's still not arrived.
I have been keeping an eye on my emails for updates though I haven't received anything.
I'm concerned that it's got lost and I have paid a lot of money for this Christmas present for a family member.

Please can you kindly inform me on what's happening.

Kind regards

Charlotte Woodgate
________________________________
From: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>
Sent: Friday, December 5, 2025 9:32:12 am
To: cwoodgate@hotmail.co.uk <cwoodgate@hotmail.co.uk>
